user.title: Connect to Akahu
user.description: Enter your Akahu App Token and User Token.

error.auth: Invalid credentials. Please check your App Token and User Token and try again.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

transfer.name: Transfer
transfer.description: Initiates a transfer between two of your connected bank accounts.

from_account.name: From Account
from_account.description: The account ID to transfer funds from.

to_account.name: To Account
to_account.description: The account ID to transfer funds to.
